casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cory Dion BENNETT 406PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 1, 2019 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, for Bennett, Cory Dion. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Donald H. Beskind, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Fred T. Korematsu Center for Law and Equality.

David Weiss, Attorney at Law, James E. Coleman, Jr., Attorney at Law, Elizabeth Hambourger, Attorney at Law, Durham, For Coalition of State and National Criminal Justice and Civil Rights Advocates.

*212The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of June 2019 by Coalition of State and National Criminal Justice and Civil Rights Advocates for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of July 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
